document: Carnegie -Mellon University CARNEGIE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AND MELLON INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE THESIS SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY TITLE AN INVESTIGATION OF ALKALI METAL DERIVATIVES OF GERMANE AND SOME NEW FLUOROSILYL COMPOUNDS PRESENTED BY LAWRENCE H.
